Title: The Case of the Hillside Stranglers
Actors: Richard Crenna, Dennis Farina, Billy Zane
Plot: The true chilling story of the "two of a kind", killin' cousins Angelo Buono and Kenneth Bianchi, better known as the Hillside Stranglers, is told in this TV drama. The movie concentrates on the killers story, as well as on the li...
